description: Try our easy to follow Layered Lava Jellies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jelly,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Layered Lava Jellies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make first layer of jelly as per packet directions. Divide evenly between the tumblers and chill for 1 1/2 hours or until set. Repeat with the next layer of jelly and add a toy dinosaur. Chill for 11/2 hours. Repeat with the remaining jellies to fill cups. Keep chilled until ready to serve.
